column4: what are the risks of using a package from gutsy with intrepid?
I'm after tmda, but it doesn't have a package for intrepid
what is that? Find out why it was obsoleted.
tagged message delivery agent. either way I'm installing it, question is if I should use an older package, or just do an install from source.

install from source. Packages have dependency information, so the package manager may go nuts trying to install versions that aren't available, but it is also not a big deal, unless it overwrites dependencies.
it apparently is unmaintained in debian https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/tmda
